summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1536, for the improvement of Central District of "North Trunk Sewer District" all in the City of Seattle, by constructing a water main with certain branches under Ordinance No. 16615 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
